item.title: Bug when creating HVD cluster and HVN simultaneously in Portal UI
item.content:encoded:
Jan 31, 21:24 UTC
Resolved - Our Engineering team has resolved the bug. Simultaneous cluster and HVN creation via the UI should now be operating normally. If you continue to experience any problems, please open a ticket with our support team.

Jan 31, 20:22 UTC
Identified - Our Engineering team has identified the cause for the following incident:

There is a bug in production causing some newly-created clusters to be deployed to the wrong HVN when also creating a new network in the same cluster create flow. This is not 100% deterministic as it only happens based on the number of fields changed when configuring the newly created network.

A small percentage of newly-created clusters from the UI may not be configured with the intended network. Please double check if your cluster is in the intended network if you created a cluster and HVN simultaneously on the cluster creation form via the UI between December 18, 2023 and now.

We are actively working on a fix. Once we have additional information, we will share another update.

item.title: HCP CLIs Fail to Refresh Token
item.content:encoded:
Jan 11, 22:33 UTC
Resolved - We've identified the root cause and will fix this in a future release. There is a workaround logging out and back in with your CLI if you run into unexpected errors.

If you're using `vlt`, then run `vlt logout` and `vlt login`.

If you're using the Terraform HCP provider, then delete your `$HOME/.config/hcp/` which will prompt you to log back in on your next run.

Jan 11, 18:57 UTC
Investigating - We've found a known bug in which HCP CLIs after one hour of inactivity fail to reauthenticate and refresh.

To circumvent this bug, try logging out and logging back in again if you receive unexpected error.

In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 13, 20:33 UTC
Scheduled - Back in October, HashiCorp announced that we will be removing End-Of-Life distro versions and minor versions of RHEL from apt|rpm.hashicorp.com on Wednesday, January 10th, 2023 in this blogpost (https://www.hashicorp.com/blog/announcing-the-linux-package-archive-site). As a user of ours, it’s imperative that we ensure that we reduce disruption to your existing systems. If you are impacted by this effort, please take some time to migrate your systems to a current OS version of your distribution/software.

We have created https://archive.releases.hashicorp.com/ if your system cannot be updated to a current version within the next two months, please redirect your downloads to the archive site which hosts the EOL/minor RHEL versions. If you have any questions, please raise an issue on https://discuss.hashicorp.com/


Thank you,

HashiCorp
